collection_holder_name: Department of Records and Information Services
pageContext.collection_description: Consists of approximately 14,000 phonograph records of broadcasts, including event reports, interviews and speeches with mayors, city officials and other dignitaries as well as programs of drama and music.
pageContext.collection_notes: Some records have been transferred to magnetic tape and are housed at the Rodgers and Hammerstein Archives in the New York City Public Library for the Performing Arts.
